help.title: Game Instructions
howToPlaySteps: Choose your table number (1-10) on the start screen.
Each table receives a unique bingo card with different tasks.
Take photos of the situations described on your card during the wedding.
Tap on a cell to mark it when you have completed the task.
The goal is to photograph a complete row (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal).
Once you have marked a complete row, you win!
tipsList: The middle cell is a free space and automatically marked.
Your game progress is automatically saved.
You can return to the table selection at any time.
Share your photos with the bridal couple after the wedding!
help.footer: Have fun playing and taking photos!
